name: Bulbasaur
desc: A dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon. It is the first Pokémon in the National Pokédex.

name: Ivysaur
desc: The evolved form of Bulbasaur. It is capable of using moves like Vine Whip and Leech Seed.

name: Venusaur
desc: The final evolved form of Bulbasaur. It has a large flower on its back that releases a sweet scent.

name: Charmander
desc: A Fire-type Pokémon known for its flame-tipped tail. It evolves into Charmeleon.

name: Charmeleon
desc: The evolved form of Charmander. It is more aggressive and has a burning tail.

name: Charizard
desc: The final evolved form of Charmander. It is a powerful Fire/Flying-type Pokémon.

name: Squirtle
desc: A Water-type Pokémon that resembles a turtle. It evolves into Wartortle.

name: Wartortle
desc: The evolved form of Squirtle. It has more developed aquatic abilities.

name: Blastoise
desc: The final evolved form of Squirtle. It is a Water-type Pokémon with powerful water cannons on its back.

name: Caterpie
desc: A Bug-type Pokémon with a voracious appetite for leaves. It evolves into Metapod.

name: Metapod
desc: The evolved form of Caterpie. It has a hard shell and is primarily known for its defensive capabilities.

name: Butterfree
desc: The final evolved form of Caterpie. It is known for its graceful and colorful appearance.

name: Weedle
desc: A Bug/Poison-type Pokémon. It evolves into Kakuna and is known for its sharp stingers.

name: Kakuna
desc: The evolved form of Weedle. It is known for its hard cocoon shell and limited moveset.

name: Beedrill
desc: The final evolved form of Weedle. It has large stingers on its forelegs for protection.

name: Pidgey
desc: A common bird Pokémon. It is known for its gentle nature and often found in grassy areas.

name: Pidgeotto
desc: The evolved form of Pidgey. It is a skilled flyer and hunter.

name: Pidgeot
desc: The final evolved form of Pidgey. It has powerful wings and is capable of flying at high speeds.

name: Rattata
desc: A small and common Pokémon. It is known for its sharp teeth and love for scavenging.

name: Raticate
desc: The final evolved form of Rattata. It is a swift runner and adept at biting.

name: Spearow
desc: A bird Pokémon that hunts for insects. It is known for its keen eyesight.

name: Fearow
desc: The final evolved form of Spearow. It has a long beak for catching prey.

name: Ekans
desc: A snake Pokémon known for its serpentine body. It can be found in grassy areas.

name: Arbok
desc: The final evolved form of Ekans. It has a menacing hood pattern on its neck.

name: Pikachu
desc: An Electric-type Pokémon known for its lightning bolt-shaped tail. It is the mascot of the Pokémon franchise.

name: Raichu
desc: The evolved form of Pikachu. It is known for its speed and electrical abilities.

name: Sandshrew
desc: A small, ground-type Pokémon known for its tough skin and burrowing abilities.

name: Sandslash
desc: The final evolved form of Sandshrew. It has sharp claws and rolls into a ball for defense.

name: Nidoran ♀
desc: A female Nidoran Pokémon known for its gentle nature and sharp, toxic spines.

name: Nidorina
desc: The evolved form of Nidoran ♀. It is cautious and prefers peaceful environments.

name: Nidoqueen
desc: The final evolved form of Nidoran ♀. It is a powerful and imposing Pokémon.

name: Nidoran ♂
desc: A male Nidoran Pokémon known for its aggressive nature and potent venom.

name: Nidorino
desc: The evolved form of Nidoran ♂. It is quick to anger and always ready to battle.

name: Nidoking
desc: The final evolved form of Nidorino. It is a formidable and fearless Pokémon.

name: Clefairy
desc: A fairy-like Pokémon known for its moonlit dances and fondness for the moon.

name: Clefable
desc: The evolved form of Clefairy. It is said to bring good fortune to those who see it.

name: Vulpix
desc: A fox-like Pokémon known for its six orange tails and fire-based abilities.

name: Ninetales
desc: The final evolved form of Vulpix. It is said to have mystical and supernatural powers.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: A balloon-like Pokémon known for its soothing lullabies and ability to put others to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: The evolved form of Jigglypuff. It has a large, round body and a kind disposition.

name: Zubat
desc: A bat Pokémon known for its sharp fangs and ability to echolocate in the dark.

name: Golbat
desc: The evolved form of Zubat. It has a massive wingspan and is a formidable flyer.

name: Oddish
desc: A plant Pokémon known for its blue leaves and nocturnal behavior.

name: Gloom
desc: The evolved form of Oddish. It emits a foul odor and is often found in gloomy places.

name: Vileplume
desc: The final evolved form of Gloom. It releases a sweet fragrance from its petals.

name: Paras
desc: A mushroom Pokémon. It forms a mutualistic relationship with the mushroom on its back.

name: Parasect
desc: The evolved form of Paras. The mushroom on its back grows larger and controls it.

name: Venonat
desc: A bug Pokémon known for its large eyes, which are sensitive to light and movement.

name: Venomoth
desc: The final evolved form of Venonat. It releases poisonous scales when threatened.

name: Diglett
desc: A burrowing Pokémon known for its underground lifestyle and sensitivity to vibrations.

name: Dugtrio
desc: The evolved form of Diglett. It consists of three Digletts and is a skilled digger.

name: Meowth
desc: A cat-like Pokémon known for its love of coins and its ability to use Pay Day.

name: Persian
desc: The evolved form of Meowth. It is elegant and graceful in its movements.

name: Psyduck
desc: A water-type Pokémon known for its chronic headaches that trigger psychic powers.

name: Golduck
desc: The evolved form of Psyduck. It is a strong swimmer and has formidable psychic abilities.

name: Mankey
desc: A monkey Pokémon known for its short temper and fiery fighting spirit.

name: Primeape
desc: The evolved form of Mankey. It is always ready for a battle and can become uncontrollable.

name: Growlithe
desc: A loyal and brave dog Pokémon known for its fiery mane and protective nature.

name: Arcanine
desc: The evolved form of Growlithe. It is a legendary and majestic fire-type Pokémon.

name: Poliwag
desc: A tadpole Pokémon known for its spiral pattern on its belly and swift swimming.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: The evolved form of Poliwag. It is skilled at swimming and uses its long arms to catch prey.

name: Poliwrath
desc: The final evolved form of Poliwhirl. It is a powerful swimmer and skilled fighter.

name: Abra
desc: A psychic Pokémon known for its ability to teleport away from danger.

name: Kadabra
desc: The evolved form of Abra. It wields a spoon and has strong psychic powers.

name: Alakazam
desc: The final evolved form of Kadabra. It has an IQ of over 5,000 and formidable psychic abilities.

name: Machop
desc: A muscular Pokémon that trains rigorously to gain strength and become a formidable fighter.

name: Machoke
desc: The evolved form of Machop. It has even more impressive muscles and physical power.

name: Machamp
desc: The final evolved form of Machop. It is known for its incredible strength and multiple arms.

name: Bellsprout
desc: A plant Pokémon with a large mouth at the end of its stalk. It ensnares prey with its vines.

name: Weepinbell
desc: The evolved form of Bellsprout. It has a bell-shaped body and digests prey in its mouth.

name: Victreebel
desc: The final evolved form of Bellsprout. It lures prey with its sweet aroma and devours them whole.

name: Tentacool
desc: A jellyfish Pokémon known for its tentacles, which it uses to capture and sting prey.

name: Tentacruel
desc: The evolved form of Tentacool. It has even longer and more powerful tentacles.

name: Geodude
desc: A rock Pokémon with arms. It rolls down mountains, smashing everything in its path.

name: Graveler
desc: The evolved form of Geodude. It travels in groups and triggers rockfalls.

name: Golem
desc: The final evolved form of Geodude. It is known for its impenetrable rock body.

name: Ponyta
desc: A horse Pokémon with a fiery mane. It is known for its incredible speed and agility.

name: Rapidash
desc: The evolved form of Ponyta. It can run as fast as a meteor and has fiery hooves.

name: Slowpoke
desc: A slow-moving Pokémon known for its dreamy and absent-minded nature.

name: Slowbro
desc: The evolved form of Slowpoke. It has a sheltering Shellder attached to its tail.

name: Magnemite
desc: A magnet Pokémon that floats using electromagnetic waves. It can join together to form larger Magnemite.

name: Magneton
desc: The evolved form of Magnemite. It generates strong magnetic forces and is often seen in power plants.

name: Farfetch'd
desc: A wild duck Pokémon that carries a leek stalk. It is a skilled swordsman.

name: Doduo
desc: A two-headed bird Pokémon known for its fast running and ability to fly short distances.

name: Dodrio
desc: The evolved form of Doduo. It has three heads and is an excellent runner.

name: Seel
desc: A sea lion Pokémon that can swim gracefully and is often seen sunbathing on beaches.

name: Dewgong
desc: The evolved form of Seel. It has strong tusks and excels at swimming in cold waters.

name: Grimer
desc: A sludge Pokémon made of toxic substances. It gives off a horrendous stench.

name: Muk
desc: The evolved form of Grimer. It is larger and more toxic, with an appetite for waste.

name: Shellder
desc: A bivalve Pokémon with a protective shell. It can clamp onto prey with its sharp tongue.

name: Cloyster
desc: The evolved form of Shellder. It has a highly durable shell and powerful defensive capabilities.

name: Gastly
desc: A ghost Pokémon composed of toxic gases. It can render opponents unconscious.

name: Haunter
desc: The evolved form of Gastly. It is mischievous and enjoys frightening people.

name: Gengar
desc: The final evolved form of Gastly. It is a shadowy and sinister Pokémon.

name: Onix
desc: A serpentine Pokémon that tunnels underground. It is known for its immense size and strength.

name: Drowzee
desc: A psychic Pokémon that uses its pendulum-like arm to hypnotize and control others.

name: Hypno
desc: The evolved form of Drowzee. It is known for its powerful hypnotic abilities.

name: Krabby
desc: A crab Pokémon with a fiery temperament. It is quick to anger and snap with its pincers.

name: Kingler
desc: The evolved form of Krabby. It has incredibly strong and large pincers.

name: Voltorb
desc: A spherical Pokémon that resembles a Poké Ball. It can explode with powerful electrical energy.

name: Electrode
desc: A round Pokémon that stores electrical energy. It can explode if agitated or if its electric charge overflows.

name: Exeggcute
desc: A group of small eggs that communicate telepathically. They evolve into Exeggutor when given a Leaf Stone.

name: Exeggutor
desc: The evolved form of Exeggcute. It has a long neck with three heads and is known for its psychic abilities.

name: Cubone
desc: A Pokémon that wears a skull helmet. It is said to be mourning its deceased mother.

name: Marowak
desc: The evolved form of Cubone. It wields a bone as a weapon and performs a dance to summon rain.

name: Hitmonlee
desc: A kicking Pokémon with powerful legs. It is a master of martial arts and specializes in kicks.

name: Hitmonchan
desc: A punching Pokémon that excels in punching techniques. It is known for its speed and agility.

name: Lickitung
desc: A Pokémon with an exceptionally long tongue. It uses its tongue to catch insects and gather food.

name: Koffing
desc: A gas Pokémon that emits toxic gases. It has a skull and crossbones pattern on its body.

name: Weezing
desc: The evolved form of Koffing. It has two heads and releases even more toxic fumes.

name: Rhyhorn
desc: A powerful Pokémon with a horn that can pierce rocks. It is known for its charging attacks.

name: Rhydon
desc: The evolved form of Rhyhorn. It has a drill-like horn and is incredibly strong.

name: Chansey
desc: A caring Pokémon that brings happiness to others. It is known for its exceptional egg-warming skills.

name: Tangela
desc: A vine Pokémon that hides its body within a tangle of vines. It moves stealthily in the grass.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: A maternal Pokémon that carries a baby Kangaskhan in its pouch. It is fiercely protective.

name: Horsea
desc: A small, aquatic Pokémon that uses its fin to swim gracefully. It is known for its beauty.

name: Seadra
desc: The evolved form of Horsea. It has sharp spines on its body and is a skilled swimmer.

name: Goldeen
desc: A graceful, fish Pokémon with a beautiful tail fin. It swims elegantly in water.

name: Seaking
desc: The final evolved form of Goldeen. It is known for its horn, which is said to bring rain.

name: Staryu
desc: A star-shaped Pokémon that regenerates lost limbs. It is said to come from the stars.

name: Starmie
desc: The evolved form of Staryu. It has a core that emits psychic energy and can levitate.

name: Mr. Mime
desc: A pantomime Pokémon that mimics human gestures. It creates invisible walls using its powers.

name: Scyther
desc: A fast-flying Pokémon with scythe-like blades for arms. It is a skilled predator.

name: Jynx
desc: A Pokémon that uses its graceful movements to mesmerize and then kiss its prey to death.

name: Electabuzz
desc: A Pokémon that emits strong electrical currents. It is known for its speed and agility.

name: Magmar
desc: A fire-spewing Pokémon that lives in volcanic craters. It is known for its intense heat.

name: Pinsir
desc: A formidable Pokémon with large pincers. It is known for its powerful grip.

name: Tauros
desc: A wild and untamed Pokémon known for its aggressive nature. It is a symbol of strength.

name: Magikarp
desc: A weak and helpless Pokémon that can splash around. It evolves into Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
desc: The evolved form of Magikarp. It is a powerful and ferocious sea serpent.

name: Lapras
desc: A gentle giant of the sea, Lapras is known for its beautiful singing and its ability to carry people on its back across bodies of water.

name: Ditto
desc: Ditto is a unique Pokémon that can transform into any other Pokémon it sees. It has a friendly and adaptable nature.

name: Eevee
desc: Eevee is a versatile Pokémon with the potential to evolve into various forms, depending on its environment and friendships.

name: Vaporeon
desc: Vaporeon is a Water-type Pokémon known for its graceful aquatic movements and its ability to manipulate water.

name: Jolteon
desc: Jolteon is an Electric-type Pokémon with sharp spines on its body, capable of discharging powerful electrical shocks.

name: Flareon
desc: Flareon is a Fire-type Pokémon that can produce intense flames from its body, making it a fearsome opponent in battle.

name: Porygon
desc: Porygon is a virtual Pokémon created by humans. It can move freely in cyberspace and has a unique geometric appearance.

name: Omanyte
desc: Omanyte is an ancient Water/Rock-type Pokémon that existed millions of years ago. It has a distinctive spiral shell.

name: Omastar
desc: Omastar is the evolved form of Omanyte. It was a powerful predator in ancient seas, known for its sharp tentacles.

name: Kabuto
desc: Kabuto is a resurrected Pokémon from ancient times. It has a hard shell and is adapted to life in water.

name: Kabutops
desc: Kabutops is the evolved form of Kabuto. It is a swift and deadly predator with scythe-like arms.

name: Aerodactyl
desc: Aerodactyl is a prehistoric Pokémon known for its impressive wingspan and its ability to soar through the skies.

name: Snorlax
desc: Snorlax is a massive and sleepy Pokémon that spends most of its time resting. It has an insatiable appetite.

name: Articuno
desc: Articuno is a legendary bird Pokémon known for its association with icy winds and its graceful appearance.

name: Zapdos
desc: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokémon that harnesses the power of electricity. It can create lightning storms.

name: Moltres
desc: Moltres is a legendary bird Pokémon that is said to be born from volcanic eruptions. It radiates intense heat.

name: Dratini
desc: Dratini is a Dragon-type Pokémon that is often found near bodies of water. It has a gentle and playful nature.

name: Dragonair
desc: Dragonair is the evolved form of Dratini. It is a serpentine Dragon-type Pokémon known for its elegance.

name: Dragonite
desc: Dragonite is a powerful Dragon/Flying-type Pokémon. Despite its size, it is known for its kindness and helpfulness.

name: Mewtwo
desc: Mewtwo is a legendary Psychic-type Pokémon with incredible psychic powers. It is highly intelligent and formidable.

name: Mew
desc: Mew is a mysterious and legendary Psychic-type Pokémon known for its ability to learn any move. It is said to contain the DNA of all Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
desc: Chikorita is a Grass-type Pokémon with a cheerful and friendly disposition. It often emits a pleasant aroma from the leaves on its neck.

name: Bayleef
desc: Bayleef is the evolved form of Chikorita. It has large and leafy appendages on its neck, which it uses to sense its surroundings.

name: Meganium
desc: Meganium is the final evolution of Chikorita. It is known for its soothing and healing powers, which it uses to calm and aid others.

name: Cyndaquil
desc: Cyndaquil is a Fire-type Pokémon with a timid and defensive nature. It can release flames from its back when threatened.

name: Quilava
desc: Quilava is the evolved form of Cyndaquil. It has a fiery personality and is known for its strong and agile movements.

name: Typhlosion
desc: Typhlosion is the final evolution of Cyndaquil. It possesses immense firepower and can create explosions with its fiery eruptions.

name: Totodile
desc: Totodile is a Water-type Pokémon with a playful and energetic demeanor. It has powerful jaws and enjoys chomping on things.

name: Croconaw
desc: Croconaw is the evolved form of Totodile. It is an adept swimmer and can catch prey with its sharp teeth while submerged.

name: Feraligatr
desc: Feraligatr is the final evolution of Totodile. It is a formidable Water-type Pokémon with powerful jaws and a fierce temperament.

name: Sentret
desc: Sentret is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its curious and vigilant nature. It stands on its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

name: Furret
desc: Furret is the evolved form of Sentret. It has a long and flexible body that allows it to chase prey through tunnels and burrows.

name: Hoothoot
desc: Hoothoot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with a built-in internal clock. It hoots at precise intervals and is known for its punctuality.

name: Noctowl
desc: Noctowl is the evolved form of Hoothoot. It possesses exceptional night vision and can silently glide through the darkness to catch prey.

name: Ledyba
desc: Ledyba is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its red and black coloration. It is often seen in gardens and fields.

name: Ledian
desc: Ledian is the evolved form of Ledyba. It is a graceful and agile flyer that uses its starry patterns to dazzle opponents.

name: Spinarak
desc: Spinarak is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its silk-spinning abilities. It creates intricate webs to ensnare prey.

name: Ariados
desc: Ariados is the evolved form of Spinarak. It is a cunning and venomous predator that lurks in dark corners.

name: Crobat
desc: Crobat is the final evolution of Zubat. It is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its speed and agility during flight.

name: Chinchou
desc: Chinchou is a Water/Electric-type Pokémon that inhabits the ocean floor. It has glowing antennae to attract prey.

name: Lanturn
desc: Lanturn is the evolved form of Chinchou. It uses its bright light to communicate with others and navigate in the dark depths.

name: Pichu
desc: Pichu is the baby form of Pikachu. It is small and cute but can release small electric shocks when startled.

name: Cleffa
desc: Cleffa is a Fairy-type Pokémon known for its star-shaped appearance. It is said to bring joy and happiness to those it encounters.

name: Igglybuff
desc: Igglybuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon that loves to sing. Its melodies have a soothing effect on both Pokémon and people.

name: Togepi
desc: Togepi is known for the eggshell it wears on its head. It spreads joy and happiness to those who care for it.

name: Togetic
desc: Togetic is the evolved form of Togepi. It is a kind-hearted and friendly Pokémon that spreads love and happiness.

name: Natu
desc: Natu is a Psychic/Flying-type Pokémon known for its peculiar and mystical behavior. It can see the future by looking at the sun and moon.

name: Xatu
desc: Xatu is the evolved form of Natu. It is a mystical and enigmatic Pokémon that stands still and gazes at the sun for extended periods.

name: Mareep
desc: Mareep is an Electric-type Pokémon covered in fluffy wool. It stores electricity in its fleece and can produce bright flashes of light.

name: Flaaffy
desc: Flaaffy is the evolved form of Mareep. Its wool continues to grow, and it becomes more proficient at generating electrical power.

name: Ampharos
desc: Ampharos is the final evolution of Mareep. It has a regal appearance and can use its long tail to emit powerful light.

name: Bellossom
desc: Bellossom is the evolved form of Gloom when exposed to a Sun Stone. It dances gracefully in the moonlight and emits a sweet fragrance.

name: Marill
desc: Marill is a Water-type Pokémon with a water-filled tail ball. It is known for its playful and joyful nature.

name: Azumarill
desc: Azumarill is the evolved form of Marill. It is a Water-type Pokémon that can use its flexible ears as a flotation device in the water.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: Sudowoodo is known for its disguise as a tree. Despite its appearance, it is actually a Rock-type Pokémon that dislikes water.

name: Politoed
desc: Politoed is the evolved form of Poliwhirl when exposed to a King's Rock. It has the ability to summon rain and is said to bring good fortune.

name: Hoppip
desc: Hoppip is a Grass/Flying-type Pokémon known for its lightweight and airy body. It can be carried away by even the gentlest breeze.

name: Skiploom
desc: Skiploom is the evolved form of Hoppip. It floats in the air and spreads its cotton-like seeds to travel with the wind.

name: Jumpluff
desc: Jumpluff is the final evolution of Hoppip. It can travel long distances by riding the wind currents using its cottony fluff.

name: Aipom
desc: Aipom is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its dexterity and prehensile tail. It uses its tail to swing from tree branches.

name: Sunkern
desc: Sunkern is a Grass-type Pokémon that relies on sunlight to grow and become stronger. It is often seen basking in the sun.

name: Sunflora
desc: Sunflora is the evolved form of Sunkern when exposed to a Sun Stone. It is known for its radiant appearance and affinity for sunlight.

name: Yanma
desc: Yanma is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed and agility in flight. Its large eyes provide excellent vision.

name: Wooper
desc: Wooper is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon that lives near water bodies. It has a carefree and cheerful disposition.

name: Quagsire
desc: Quagsire is the evolved form of Wooper. It is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its carefree attitude and love of swimming.

name: Espeon
desc: Espeon is one of the evolved forms of Eevee when exposed to high friendship during the daytime. It has powerful psychic abilities.

name: Umbreon
desc: Umbreon is one of the evolved forms of Eevee when exposed to high friendship during the nighttime. It is a Dark-type Pokémon known for its mysterious aura.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its mischievous behavior. It is often associated with superstitions and omens.

name: Slowking
desc: Slowking is the evolved form of Slowpoke when a Shellder bites its head. It has heightened intelligence and psychic powers.

name: Misdreavus
desc: Misdreavus is a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its mischievous pranks and eerie cries. It enjoys playing tricks on unsuspecting travelers.
